name: Extreme-G 2
description: Jump on and get ready to play the 90â€™s hit classic re-release Extreme-G 2 on Steam! Take control of the evolution bikes in XG2 with sharper handling, quicker acceleration, new top speeds, and tracks that will leave you gasping. Play this classic title repackaged for Steam today!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Integrated graphics are not recommended
